definitions.definition: The flank or side of an animal, now almost exclusively a pig when cured and salted; a side of bacon .
A piece or strip cut off of something else, generally a piece of wood (timber).

main_definition: The flank or side of an animal, now almost exclusively a pig when cured and salted; a side of bacon .
secondary_definitions: A piece or strip cut off of something else, generally a piece of wood (timber).
